titles.title: To prohibit the negotiation of trade agreements that include waivers of the "Buy American Act".
To prohibit the negotiation of trade agreements that include waivers of the "Buy American Act".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Prohibits the use of funds appropriated for FY2015 or any ensuing fiscal year for negotiating a trade agreement that includes a waiver of Buy American Act requirements.
